Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.Literal.BOOLEAN
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.Literal.DATETIME
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.Literal.DECIMAL
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.DEFAULT_PARSE_DTS
    If you call a literal's Literal.getDatatype() method, you are presented with the data type, if there is one. So the processing of that is to be moved.
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.Literal.DOUBLE
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.Literal.FLOAT
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.namespace.HTTP.STATUSCODE
    non-standard: use HTTP.RESPONSE_CODE
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.namespace.HTTPHEADER.STATUSCODE
    non-standard: use HTTP.RESPONSE_CODE
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.Literal.STRING
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.Literal.XSD
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.Literal.escapeForMarkup(String)
    Use NxUtil.escapeForMarkup(String)
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.escapeForMarkup(String)
    Moved to NxUtil.
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.Literal.escapeForNx(String)
    Use NxUtil.escapeForNx(String)
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.escapeForNx(String)
    Moved to NxUtil.
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.parseBNode(String)
    Doesn't do much parsing apart from checking the first chars to be :_.
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.parseLiteral(String)
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.parseLiteral(String, boolean)
    Doesn't do much parsing apart from checking the first char to be a quotation mark.
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.parseNode(String)
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.parseNode(String, boolean)
    Tells the type of the node according to the first char in parameter str.
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.parseNodes(String, boolean)
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.parseResource(String)
    Doesn't do much parsing apart from checking the first and the last char to be angle brackets.
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.parseVariable(String)
    Doesn't do much parsing apart from checking the first char to be a question mark.
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.Literal.unescape(String)
    Use NxUtil.unescape(String)
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.unescape(String)
    Moved to NxUtil.
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser.unescape(String, boolean)
    Moved to NxUtil.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser(InputStream, boolean)
    See NxParser.NxParser(Reader, boolean).
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser(InputStream, boolean, boolean)
    See NxParser.NxParser(Reader, boolean) and NxParser.DEFAULT_PARSE_DTS.
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser(Reader, boolean)
    This is an iterator and therefore cannot throw exceptions at all. Therefore parameter strict is pointless here.
    org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser(Reader, boolean, boolean)
    See NxParser.NxParser(Reader, boolean) and NxParser.DEFAULT_PARSE_DTS.
